about_the_game:
When Hana arrives on an island in search of a millionaire husband and a life full of comforts, she discovers things are not going to be as easy as she had thought. Forgetting about her rich husband and her easy job, Hana will have to make her fortune by transforming a dilapidated building into the best brothel that has ever existed.

⚫A 3D sandbox style hentai game with 2D illustrations made by a talented artist.
⚫Seduce your clients and have sex with them every day to increase your profits.
⚫Buy new sections for the hotel and upgrade them to increase your venue's reputation, which will give you more customers and money!
⚫Hire attractive employees and get to know them better, will love arise with any of them?
⚫Many more things to come.

The game is still early in development, so any feedback we receive is greatly appreciated. Also, if you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to write to me and I will respond as soon as possible!

content_descriptors.notes: As a prostitute, your job is to seduce your clients and get them to buy some sexual treatment from you, so you will continually be seeing sexual illustrations, especially as you level up and unlock better illustrations. Additionally, as you advance in romantic relationships with girls, you will also be able to see sexual illustrations between them.

When Hana arrives on an island in search of a millionaire husband and a life full of comforts, she discovers things are not going to be as easy as she had thought. Forgetting about her rich husband and her easy job, Hana will have to make her fortune by transforming a dilapidated building into the best brothel that has ever existed.

⚫Seduce your clients and have sex with them every day to increase your profits.

The game is still early in development, so any feedback we receive is greatly appreciated. Also, if you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to write to me and I will respond as soon as possible!
name: Prostitute Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Build the best love hotel in the world and have tons of sex every day!
